content: the mountain trail triangle scarf is a free crochet pattern on my blog the mountain trail triangle crochet shawl is a gently textured triangle crochet shawl perfect for adding a warm cozy touch to any outfit with basic simple stitches and easy to memorize stitch pattern a beautiful cozy addition to your fall and winter wardrobe made with the same stitch pattern as all of the patterns in my mountain trail stitch pattern series all of the crochet patterns in this series use my favorite stitch combination - the interlocking arches columns crochet stitch which looks woven link to complete video tutorial is provided
